text: Luis de Ridder (23 February 1928 - 31 July 2004) was an Argentine alpine skier. He competed at the 1948 Winter Olympics and the 1952 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2004 deaths Category:Argentine male alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Argentina Category:Alpine skiers at the 1948 Winter Olympics Category:Alpine skiers at the 1952 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Buenos Aires
title: Luis de Ridder
